section.name: Corporate Sponsors and Ownership
section.para: NGINX is sponsored by F5, Inc..
NGINX is a registered trademark of F5, Inc.

section.name: Enterprise Distributions
section.para: F5 provides enterprise distributions of NGINX, including NGINX Plus.

section.name: Commercial Support
section.para: Commercial support for NGINX is available with the Open Source Subscription Bundles from F5.

section.name: Training and Certification
section.para: NGINX training is available from F5.
